bug.author: yuzhu
bug.summary: getStatus of a specific file following a listStatus on the parent may trigger unnecessary syncMetadata
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.1.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug with the default configuration, after listStatus(/parent), getStatus(/parent/file1) should not trigger a call tosyncMetadata. but currently it does because the ufsSyncPathCache caches the parent directory, but we check for exact match /parent/file1 and we won't be able to find the exact match in our cache To Reproduce see above Expected behavior getStatus("/dir/file") should not trigger UFS sync Urgency medium
